response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality, craftsmanship, and the unique benefits it offers.

Given your discerning taste and appreciation for premium items, I believe this product would be a perfect match for your needs and desires. I am extending an offer to purchase the product at a special price of $1,400,000, a generous discount that reflects my confidence in its value and your potential satisfaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you require any additional information about the product. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process of acquiring this remarkable item.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
